articles.title: AI Needs To Work For People, Not The Other Way Around
articles.description: If HR teams want to effectively utilize AI technology, they must approach it in a way that serves employees and builds a stronger workplace.

Dan Drellich is the senior vice president, business partnering, and managing director of EMD Electronics.

articles.title: Is Hearing Technology Working For Us, Or Against Us?
articles.description: Hearing technology is advancing, but is it making life easier or harder? Bill Schiffmiller explores its impact on people, workplaces, and brands.
articles.content:
The future of hearing technology is here, but it is not always what we expect.
Not long ago, I was sitting in a noisy restaurant, trying to enjoy dinner with friends. My hearing aids worked hard, filtering voices, suppressing background noise, and ad... [7132 chars]

articles.title: AI meets capital: Bizcap welcomes 8fig into its global portfolio to accelerate growth funding
articles.description: MELBOURNE, Australia, Oct. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Bizcap, together with its US affiliate NewCo Capital Group, is proud to announce that it has acquired 8fig and that it has become part of the Bizcap Group, marking a major step in the fintech company's global expansion and leadership in technology-led business funding.
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia, Oct. 21, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Bizcap, together with its US affiliate NewCo Capital Group, is proud to announce that it has acquired 8fig and that it has become part of the Bizcap Group, marking a major step in the fintech compan... [4305 chars]

articles.title: Reliance Digital launches ‘Festival of Electronics’, announces new offers
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Oct 20: During the festive season Reliance Digital launched “Festival of Electronics” and announced unbeatable exciting offers on its products, latest in cutting-edge technology. From state-of-the-art gadgets to essential home appliances, Reliance Digital is making it easier than ever to upgrade and celebrate this Diwali in style. Shoppers can enjoy GST-reduced prices on applicable products and instant discounts of up to Rs 20,000 with leading bank cards. The offers are available across all Reliance Digital, My Jio […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
JAMMU, Oct 20: During the festive season Reliance Digital launched “Festival of Electronics” and announced unbeatable exciting offers on its products, latest in cutting-edge technology.
From state-of-the-art gadgets to essenti... [1589 chars]

articles.title: Javid Dar inaugurates Autumn Flower Festival at SKUAST-K
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent SRINAGAR, Oct 20: Minister for Agriculture Production, Rural Development, Panchayati Raj, Cooperative and Election Departments, Javid Ahmad Dar, today inaugurated Autumn Flower Festival (Chrysanthemum Show) at Sher-e-Kashmir University of Agricultural Sciences and Technology-Kashmir (SKUAST-K) here. Speaking on the occasion, Minister Dar congratulated the university authorities, particularly the Faculty of Floriculture, for organizing the colourful event that celebrates Kashmir’s floral diversity and artistic traditions. He said that the festival aims to showcase the natural beauty of Kashmir’s flora while […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
SRINAGAR, Oct 20: Minister for Agriculture Production, Rural Development, Panchayati Raj, Cooperative and Election Departments, Javid Ahmad Dar, today inaugurated Autumn Flower Festival (Chrysanthemum Show) at Sher-e-Kashmir U... [1394 chars]
